page.title: 17INDUSTRY-RESERVOIRS
page.content: INDUSTRY- INLAND WATER DOWNHILL RESERVOIR LOCATION NANNY COW HILL This original reservoir was in a state of bad repair and midway through 1984 Mowlem a London-based firm of Civil Engineers were awarded a contract to repair and enlarge the existing reservoir. Four children from St. John Bosco R.C. School arranged an interview with the site manager who very kindly explained to them the purpose of Mowlem's operation and the benefits the local community might receive. This is to enable the reservoir to cater for the area in the 1990's.
